duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and lead a team of BI professionals in the development and maintenance of data solutions and reports.
Partner with stakeholders and IT Data Warehouse Team to elicit and document business requirements for new reports.
Translate data results into written reports, tables, graphs and charts to convey information to management.
Perform ongoing monitoring and refinement of reports, providing technical support for existing reports and tools.
Participate in due diligence and evaluation of systems, as well as in cross-organizational technology initiatives.
Provide guidance, annual reviews, and formal discipline actions for the BI Analyst team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in data analytics, data science, computer science, management information systems, finance, statistics, or related field required; MBA or post-graduate degree preferred.
